greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array read by antidiagonals related to the symmetric representation of sigma.
comment: The number of parts k in the square array is equal to A000203(k) hence the sum of parts k is equal to A064987(k).
The structure has a three-dimensional representation using polycubes. T(n,k) is the height of a column. The total area in the horizontal level z gives A000203(z).
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Jul 04 2014
